quranQuote: And We have certainly created man in the best of stature.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear...
And whoever saves one [a life], it is as if he had saved mankind entirely.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Verily, with every difficulty, there is relief.
And We have certainly created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may test him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
And We have certainly honored the children of Adam...
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all, but it is the people who are wronging themselves.

And your Lord is the Forgiving, Full of Mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. But for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape.

And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.
Say, 'If you should love Allah, then follow me, [so] Allah will love you and forgive you your sins. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.'
Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
And say, 'My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.'
And We have certainly created man into hardship.
Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant and loves those who purify themselves.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive [to Allah].
Indeed, with hardship, there is relief.
And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive [to Allah].
So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
Allah does not like corruption.

And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.

And your Lord is the Forgiving, Full of Mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. But for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape.

And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.
And We have certainly created man in hardship.
Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant and loves those who purify themselves.

And your Lord is the Forgiving, Full of Mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. But for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape.
And let there be [arising] from you a nation inviting to [all that is] good, enjoining what is right and forbidding what is wrong, and those will be the successful.

And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.
Indeed, your effort is diverse.
And whatever strikes you of disaster - it is for what your hands have earned; but He pardons much.
And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.
And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him. And if He touches you with good - then He is over all things competent.
Indeed, Allah is with those who are of righteous intent and doers of good.
And We have certainly created man in the best form and stature.

And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.
And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].
And We have certainly created man in the best of stature.
Indeed, Allah loves the righteous [who fear Him].
And say, 'My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.'

And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, 'Peace!'

And your Lord is the Forgiving, Full of Mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. But for them is an appointed time from which they will never find an escape.
And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help.
And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out.
Indeed, Allah is with those who are patient.
Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
